body:
### Welcome to Crowbar!

Crowbar is a platform for server provisioning and deployment from bare metal. It provides server discovery, firmware upgrades, and operating system installation using PXE Boot. It deploys applications on top of functioning operating systems using chef.

This is a stub home page - for now, please [go to the wiki](https://github.com/crowbar/crowbar/wiki).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Crowbar.github.com
